routes.name: Home
routes.seoPageTitle: Welcome to Fit Club Lounge - Fairfield, CT
routes.pageDescription: Welcome to Fit Club Lounge, the premier event space in Fairfield, CT, offering a lively coffee bar, smoothies, Italian Ice, and more. Perfect for all occasions and age groups.

routes.name: About
routes.seoPageTitle: About Fit Club Lounge - Fairfield, CT
routes.pageDescription: Discover the vibrant world of Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT. Learn about our unique event space, energetic gym area, and how we make business and entertaining easy.

routes.name: Kids' Parties
routes.seoPageTitle: Kids' Parties at Fit Club Lounge - Fairfield, CT
routes.pageDescription: Host unforgettable kids' parties at Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT. Our space is filled with age-appropriate games and activities. Packages start at just $299 for one room.

routes.name: Corporate Events

routes.pageDescription: Elevate your corporate events at Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT. Our spacious facility is ideal for Annual Meetings, Seminars, Trade Shows, Holiday Parties, Employee Training, Team Building, and more. Starting at $3,000.

routes.name: Networking Events
routes.seoPageTitle: Networking Events at Fit Club Lounge - Fairfield, CT
routes.pageDescription: Connect and network at Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT. Our versatile event space is perfect for hosting networking events and gatherings of all sizes.

routes.name: Special Events

routes.pageDescription: Make your special events unforgettable at Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT. Our dynamic space is perfect for hosting a wide range of special occasions.

routes.name: Gallery

routes.pageDescription: Browse through our gallery to see the vibrant and exciting events held at Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT. Get inspired for your next gathering.

routes.name: Contact
routes.seoPageTitle: Contact Fit Club Lounge - Fairfield, CT
routes.pageDescription: Contact Fit Club Lounge in Fairfield, CT, at 1496 Post Rd, Fairfield, CT 06824-5911, USA. Call us at 203-246-8058 to inquire about our event space and services.
